name: Asteroid Blaster #unitycoursejam
description:
Asteroid Blaster is my submission for the Unity Course Community Jam, the theme for this jam was "spin".

I decided to remake the arcade game Asteroids. The asteroids and the player both spin so it fits in nicely with the theme. 

GAMEPLAY

Classic Asteroids gameplay just shoot the asteroids and see how high a score you can get

CONTROLS

Keys

up arrow  - Thrust

left arrow - rotate left

right arrow - rotate right

ctrl - fire

Gamepads can also be used

FUTURE FEATURES

Add alien ship that will chase player

Update visuals

High Score Tables

source code and assets can be found here https://github.com/FrozenWellStudios/AsteroidBlaster

player ship is from the Space kit by kenney and can be obtained from here http://kenney.nl/assets/space-kit

explosions used are https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/vfx/particles/space-arcade-effects-free-10...
